title: Crime of the Century
description:
The criminals are after your pet's food! Joe falls victim to a strange crime that leads to a series of unfortunate events including a scene straight out of Alfred Hitchcocks worst nightmares, a very messy trip to the Vet, and an armed confrontation involving a meat tenderizer! Then Joe reads some crazy stories from patreon members.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
